title: Rejection of evolution by religious groups
summary: An ongoing, recurring cultural, political, and theological dispute (sometimes termed the creation vs. evolution debate or the origins debate) exists regarding the origins of the Earth, of humanity, and of other life. In accordance with creationism, species were once widely believed to be fixed products of divine creation, but since the mid-19th century, evolution by natural selection has been established by the scientific community as an empirical scientific fact.
